parameters.name: ResourceARN
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource to tag.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: A list of tags to assign to the resource. (dict) --- A key-value pair you can use to manage, filter, and search for your resources. Allowed characters include UTF-8 letters, numbers, spaces, and the following characters: + - = . _ : /. The key part of a tag's key-value pair. The key can't start with aws:. The value part of a tag's key-value pair.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key part of a tag's key-value pair. The key can't start with aws:.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value part of a tag's key-value pair.

nested_items.name: ResourceARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource you tagged.
